products.title: Harewood Plain Red Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood plain is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With its seductive colour palette and attractive prices harewood is one of their bestselling plain ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. The harewood plain red vertical blind offers great value for money.

products.title: Harewood Blackout Red Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood blackout is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With the added benefit of its colour matched blackout backing and attractive prices harewood blackout is one of their bestselling blackout ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. Choose the high-quality harewood blackout red vertical blind from kingston blinds direct & receive free delivery on all orders over 145.
